result.execSummary:
The defendant Tonya Lyn Muzynoski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: each other and any other sentence defendant is now serving

Absolute sobriety from controlled substances, and no possession of controlled substances unless valid prescription and then only in the amount/manner as prescribed.

No contact with family of victim R.L.M.

Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO.

AODA and any follow up recommended.

DNA sample.

15CF308 - Ct. 2>> 6 years TOTAL: 3 years incarceration and 3 years ES
>>>> ALL sentences to run concurrent to each other and any other sentence defendant is now serving.
CONDITIONS of ES:  Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; AODA and any follow up recommended; Absolute sobriety from controlled substances, and no possession of controlled substances unless valid prescription and then only in the amount/manner as prescribed; FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; No contact with family of victim R.L.M; DNA sample and surcharge; CC.

>>>>Defendant is NOT eligible for either CIP or SAP
>>>>Sentence credit: 
All counts in 17CF1013 - 788 days credit for time already served
All counts in other cases 15CF306, 14CF976, 15CF308 - 938 days credit for time already served.
